vote.title: Authorize (1) an increase in the construction services contract with Estrada Concrete Company, LLC to add funding to compensate the contractor for additional alley pavement for the alley between 15632-15724 Golden Creek Road and 6231-6239 La Cosa Drive and 15503-15531 Bay Point Drive; and (2) extending the contract term a total of 127 calendar days - Not to exceed $243,003.00, from $2,658,786.21 to $2,901,789.21 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
vote.description: Authorize (1) an increase in the construction services contract with Estrada Concrete Company, LLC to add funding to compensate the contractor for additional alley pavement for the alley between 15632-15724 Golden Creek Road and 6231-6239 La Cosa Drive and 15503-15531 Bay Point Drive; and (2) extending the contract term a total of 127 calendar days - Not to exceed $243,003.00, from $2,658,786.21 to $2,901,789.21 - Financing: Street and Transportation (A) Fund (2017 General Obligation Bond Funds)
